metadata.title: AvePoint ML/GenAI Implementation Specifications
metadata.description: Detailed implementation specifications generated from metaprompts for 20 Fabric Workloads

model_architecture.justification: Isolation Forest excels at high-dimensional anomaly detection without requiring labeled data. Permission telemetry is inherently high-dimensional (user × resource × permission type × time) and anomalies are rare by definition.
model_architecture.ensemble_approach: Two-stage: Isolation Forest for initial screening (fast), Autoencoder for confirmation on flagged cases (accurate). Final score = weighted average (0.4 × IF_score + 0.6 × AE_reconstruction_error).
model_architecture.threshold_calibration: Use validation set with injected anomalies to calibrate threshold at 95% recall for known anomaly patterns. Dynamic threshold adjustment based on rolling false positive rate feedback from SOC analysts.

model_architecture.justification: LightGBM handles tabular data with mixed feature types efficiently, supports class imbalance natively, and provides fast inference for scoring millions of permission-user pairs.
model_architecture.class_imbalance_handling: SMOTE oversampling of 'excessive' class combined with class_weight='balanced' parameter. Target ratio 1:3 (excessive:necessary).
model_architecture.score_aggregation: User-level Least-Privilege Score = 100 × (1 - (Σ P(excessive|permission_i) × weight_i) / Σ weight_i), where weight = sensitivity_level of resource.
model_architecture.calibration_approach: Platt scaling (sigmoid) calibration on held-out validation set to ensure probability outputs are well-calibrated for threshold decisions.

model_architecture.justification: Prophet handles multiple seasonality (weekly, monthly, quarterly review cycles), is robust to missing data, and provides interpretable components (trend, seasonality, holidays).
model_architecture.hierarchical_approach: Bottom-up: Forecast at user level, aggregate to department, then tenant. Reconcile using MinTrace optimal combination.
model_architecture.changepoint_detection: Automatic changepoint detection with n_changepoints=25, changepoint_prior_scale=0.05 for intervention effects
model_architecture.uncertainty_quantification: 80% and 95% prediction intervals via MCMC sampling
